DOC.brief_title: Upper Limb Rehabilitation After Stroke Assisted With Hybrid Electrical Stimulation ( ES ) -Robot System
DOC.criteria: The recruited subject unilateral ischemic brain injury intracerebral hemorrhage least 6 month onset single stroke moderate level motor impairment affect upper limb , assess FuglMeyer Assessment ( 9 < shoulder/elbow < 27 ; 6 < wrist/hand < 18 ) enough cognition able follow training protocol assess Minimetal State Examination ( MMSE > 21 ) detectable EMG signal ( 3 time standard deviation baseline ) upper limb muscle .
